AI Description: LibROM is a library for Reduced Order Models (ROMs) that provides tools for model reduction of complex systems in engineering and computational science applications. It offers a range of algorithms and methods to reduce the computational cost of high-fidelity simulations.
Core Features: Implementation Of Various Model Reduction Algorithms, Support For Reduction Of Large-Scale Systems, Integration With Common Computational Frameworks, Efficient Handling Of High-Dimensional Data
General Tags: Software Library, Model Reduction, Computational Science
